Batch Unit Converter

Paste a list and get bulk conversions to the unit you need.

How to use

  1. Paste values with units.
  2. Choose the target unit.
  3. Convert and copy the result.

Batch convert

Tips & gotchas

  • Use short units like ft, in, cm, m.
  • Export results into spreadsheets.
